verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Unto thee O LORD נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa. do I lift up

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Hai, O my God בְּךָ֣ be-Cha בָ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> Va-tach-ti I trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not אֵב֑וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> e-Voo-shah; in thee let me not be ashamed אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יַֽעַלְצ֖וּ <S%H5970><s%> ya-'al-Tzu triumph אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai let not mine enemies לִֽי׃ Li.

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Indeed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- who קֹ֭וֶיךָ <S%H6960><s%> Koei-cha Yea let none that wait לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu; on thee be ashamed יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu, let them be ashamed הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים <S%H898><s%> hab-bog-Dim which transgress רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> rei-Kam. without cause

דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chei-cha me thy ways יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3045><s%> ho-di-'E-ni; Shew אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H734><s%> o-re-cho-Tei-cha me thy paths לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3925><s%> lam-me-De-ni. teach

הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי <S%H1869><s%> had-Ri-Che-ni Lead בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ׀ <S%H571><s%> va-'a-mit-Te-cha me in thy truth וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי <S%H3925><s%> ve-lam-me-De-ni, and teach כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei me for thou [art] the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <S%H3468><s%> yish-'I; of my salvation אוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> 'ot-Cha for קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי <S%H6960><s%> kiv-Vi-ti, on thee do I wait כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. all the day

זְכֹר־ <S%H2142><s%> ze-chor- Remember רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mei-cha thy tender mercies יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H2617><s%> va-cha-sa-Dei-cha; and thy lovingkindnesses כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> me-'o-Lam for they [have been] ever of old הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

חַטֹּ֤אות <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tot not the sins נְעוּרַ֨י׀ <S%H5271><s%> ne-'u-Rai of my youth וּפְשָׁעַ֗י <S%H6588><s%> u-fe-sha-'Ai, nor my transgressions אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> tiz-Kor Remember כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> ke-chas-de-Cha according to thy mercy זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> ze-chor- remember לִי־ li- אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an sake טוּבְךָ֣ <S%H2898><s%> tu-ve-Cha thou me for thy goodness' יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. sake O LORD

טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- Good וְיָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> ve-ya-Shar and upright יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [is] the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that יוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H3384><s%> yo-Reh therefore will he teach חַטָּאִ֣ים <S%H2400><s%> chat-ta-'Im sinners בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech. in the way

יַדְרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1869><s%> yad-Rech will he guide עֲ֭נָוִים <S%H6035><s%> 'A-na-vim The meek בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> bam-mish-Pat; in judgment וִֽילַמֵּ֖ד <S%H3925><s%> vi-lam-Med will he teach עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> 'a-na-Vim and the meek דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ko. his way

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אָרְח֣וֹת <S%H734><s%> a-re-Chot All the paths יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed [are] mercy וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met; and truth לְנֹצְרֵ֥י <S%H5341><s%> le-no-tze-Rei unto such as keep בְ֝רִית֗וֹ <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-To, his covenant וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5713><s%> ve-'e-do-Tav. and his testimonies

לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'an- sake שִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha For thy name's יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; sake O LORD וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ <S%H5545><s%> ve-sa-lach-Ta pardon לַ֝עֲוֹנִ֗י <S%H5771><s%> la-'a-vo-Ni, mine iniquity כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- for it [is] great הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he הָ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> Ha-'ish What man יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re [is] he that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; Jehovah י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3384><s%> yo-Ren-nu, archer בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech in the way יִבְחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char. [that] he shall choose

נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-sho His soul בְּט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> be-Tov at ease תָּלִ֑ין <S%H3885><s%> ta-Lin; shall dwell וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <S%H2233><s%> ve-zar-'O, and his seed יִ֣ירַשׁ <S%H3423><s%> Yi-rash shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the earth

ס֣וֹד <S%H5475><s%> Sod The secret יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לִירֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> li-re-'Av; [is] with them that fear וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ <S%H1285><s%> u-ve-ri-To, them his covenant לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> le-ho-di-'Am. him and he will shew

עֵינַ֣י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai Mine eyes תָּ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> Ta-mid [are] ever אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; toward the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He יוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tzi for he shall pluck מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> me-Re-shet out of the net רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lai. my feet

פְּנֵה־ <S%H6437><s%> pe-neh- Turn אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> ve-chon-Ne-ni thee unto me and have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For יָחִ֖יד <S%H3173><s%> ya-Chid upon me for I [am] desolate וְעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> ve-'a-Ni and afflicted אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni. I

צָר֣וֹת <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rot The troubles לְבָבִ֣י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi of my heart הִרְחִ֑יבוּ <S%H7337><s%> hir-Chi-vu; are enlarged מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתַ֗י <S%H4691><s%> mi-me-tzu-ko-Tai, of my distresses הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'E-ni. [O] bring thou me out

רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh Look עָ֭נְיִי <S%H6040><s%> 'A-ne-yi upon mine affliction וַעֲמָלִ֑י <S%H5999><s%> va-'a-ma-Li; and my pain וְ֝שָׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> ve-Sa, and forgive לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all חַטֹּאותָֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> chat-to-Tai. all my sins

רְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> re-'eh- Consider אוֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai mine enemies כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for רָ֑בּוּ <S%H7231><s%> Rab-bu; for they are many וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת <S%H8130><s%> ve-sin-'At and they hate חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas me with cruel שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃ <S%H8135><s%> se-ne-'U-ni. hatred

שָׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Rah O keep נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi my soul וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-ni; and deliver אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> e-Voosh, me let me not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חָסִ֥יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti for I put my trust בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

תֹּם־ <S%H8537><s%> tom- Let integrity וָיֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> va-Yo-sher and uprightness יִצְּר֑וּנִי <S%H5341><s%> yitz-tze-Ru-ni; preserve כִּ֝֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6960><s%> kiv-vi-Ti-cha. me for I wait

פְּדֵ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> pe-Deh Redeem אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol, of all צָֽרוֹתָיו׃ <S%H6869><s%> Tza-ro-tav out of all his troubles
